title: Daniel Thiele
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Daniel Thiele. I am a Research Associate at Weizenbaum Institute, Berlin, c/o Free University Berlin, and a PhD candidate in political science at University of Vienna. In my research, I focus on political communication on social media, citizen-generated communication, and populism. I have a strong interest in computational methods and try to contribute useful R-packages here.
You can contact me at my new email address and find out more about my work here::
